questiontext.text:
A machine emits a short pulse of sound, with constant intensity over a duration of 33 ms and an amplitude of 10dB. Estimate the highest possible frequency emitted within the pulse (to the nearest 2 d.p.):

Frequency: {1:NUMERICAL:=30.303:0.01#You got it!~%100%60.6061:0.01#You got it!~%100%15.1515:0.01#You got it!}Hz
